mods.abstract: This recording features a conversation between radio host, Eddie Hill and Hank Snow. Ray Price is heard at the beginning of the recording. Red Foley calls in and talks to Snow while Hill continues to broadcast. The conversation is primary about the turntables breaking and what to do in the mean time. Hill does announce songs that were played in real time but are not included on this recording. The tape is dated April of 1957. This tape is the third for the Eddie Hill Show and conversation has been carried over from the second tape. This tape is forty-eight of an unidentified number of tapes.
